author: jeremias
msg: Note by jeremias: I haven't found any information which encoding/charset should be used with basic authentication. RFC 2617 doesn't seem to address that. The behaviour for characters outside the US-ASCII (7bit) charset may not be as expected.

author: jacopoc
msg: This change to the inventory balance routine will take into account the scenario where the (negative) atp of an existing inventory item with backorders on it is set > 0 by a manual inventory variance.
The trick is to always add the current item to the list of items to rebalance.

author: elecharny
msg: Check the DN to avoid a normalization if it has already been done : this save 4% of CPU

author: elecharny
msg: Replaced the String.lowerCase() method by the faster
StringTools.lowerCaseAscii() method, which is used for AttributeType.
